item.title: Tornado hits southwestern Oklahoma, National Weather Service says
item.description: The storm was near Granite, a town with a population of about 1,600, at about 3:37 a.m. CST, the service said.

item.title: Spirit Airlines files for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection
item.description: A federal judge had blocked the budget airline's proposed merger with JetBlue.

item.title: Moscow warns US missile authorization may mark new level of involvement in conflict
item.description: Russian would consider Ukraine's use of U.S. long-range weapons against Russian forces to be a "qualitatively new round of tensions" between the Mosco...

item.title: Tracking Trump's picks to serve in his Cabinet, administration
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump is rolling out names for top jobs in his administration.

item.title: Biden makes historic visit to the Amazon rainforest
item.description: President Joe Biden made a historic visit to the Amazon on Sunday and made a call for future generations to protect the wildlife in the region.
